Device.name: Fibaro Button v3.2
Device.Description: Press the button 6 times to wake it up

Parameter.Title: Scenes sent to the controller
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines which actions result in sending scene IDs and attributes assigned to them 1 – Button Pressed 1 time 2 – Button Pressed 2 times 4 – Button Pressed 3 times 8 – Button Pressed 4 times 16 – Button Pressed 5 times 32 – Button Held Down 64 – Button Released

Parameter.Title: Associations in Z-Wave Network Security Mode
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines how commands are sent in specific association groups: as secure or non secure. Parameters is active only in Z-Wave network Security Mode. It does not apply to the 1st Lifeline group Available settings: 1 – 2nd group sent as secure 2 – 3rd group sent as secure 4 – 4th group sent as secure

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 1 time - Command sent to 2nd Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in the 2nd association group after 1 press. Available settings: 0 – No action 1 – Switch On 2 – Switch Off 3 – Switch On/Off - alternately

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 1 time Switch On Command for Second Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines what value means switch on, that will be sent to the second association group

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 2 times - Command sent to 2nd Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in the 2nd association group after 2 presses. Available settings: 0 – No action 1 – Switch On 2 – Switch Off 3 – Switch On/Off - alternately

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 2 times Switch On Command for 2nd Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines what value means switch on, that will be sent to the 2nd association group

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 3 times - Command sent to 2nd Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines commands sent to devices assocaited in the 2nd association group after 3 presses. Available settings: 0 – No action 1 – Switch On 2 – Switch Off 3 – Switch On/Off - alternately

Parameter.Title: Button Pressed 3 times Switch On Command for 2nd Association Group
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines what value means switch on, that will be sent to the second association group

Parameter.Title: Button Held Down - Command sent to 2nd Association Group (May not exist)
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines commands sent to devices associated in the 2nd association group after the button is held down. Available settings: 0 – No action 1 – Start level Change Up (Brightening) 2 – Start level Change Down (Dimming) 3 – Alternate between start level up and down

Parameter.Title: Alarm frame triggers
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines which actions result in sending alarm frames to 4th association group Available settings: 1 – Button Pressed 1 time 2 – Button Pressed 2 times 4 – Button Pressed 3 times 8 – Button Pressed 4 times 16 – Button Pressed 5 times 32 – Button Held Down 64 – Button Released
